attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Abolish Stamp Duty on all properties. It adds such a lot to the final price, the vendor then has to drop their price to allow for this extra tax. Also abolish HIP's no one uses them, they are not necessary. Also if your property is on the market for more than a year, you have to pay out again and at the moment their is no standard fee for them, the prices vary a lot.
